name: Bio cover
uniques: Does not need removal of [All]
Gives a defensive bonus of [-10]%
Tile provides yield without assigned population
Can be built outside your borders
Removes removable features when built
Unpillagable
biocover
Provides [1] [Bio matter] <if [Bio cover usage] is constructed>
Provides [1] [Bio matter] <if [Economical bio cover usage] is constructed> <if [BTA production] is constructed>
Provides [2] [Bio matter] <if [Advanced economical bio cover usage] is constructed> <if [BTA production] is constructed>
